divs: sighting detailsdo you remember seeing the reports in the news about a ufo seen over several states, maybe a week or a week and a half ago? my kids called me on the phone one night, telling me that they saw something that looked like the objects that was reported, but they told be about two days before it came out on the news. i asked them is they recorded it, they said no...i guess they were caught in the excitement of it all. they told me that they saw the same object again last friday (09\23\11) between 10:55 and 11:00pm in they same vicinity from were they saw it the first time. they said that the object was hovering on top of houses, in a neighborhood across from were they saw it the first time. they couldn't make out the shape of the object, it seemed to blend in with they night sky, but it had two or three��� large light and a small blinking red light (i���m getting this from three different perspectives) the driver and two other teenagers. the two large light s were beaming straight ahead...my daughter stated that you could see the two large beams coming from the lights. they actually followed the ufo into the neighborhood, but when they tried to get their cameras ready to record it ...it flew away, in a matter of a second it was a dot far away in the distance.
Summary: Two to three large white lights that were beaming straight ahead, and one red blnking light.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mission Bend
This sighting has never been favorited.
